text: allahvada, avasana dinayada visvasa kara, allahge margayehi yuddha karannanta samana vasayen, (visvasa nokara sitimin) hajivarunta vatura laba dennanvada, suddha vu ema næmadumpalata sevaya karannanvada, oba pat kalehuda? allahge samuhayehi movun (me dedena) sama vanne næta. allah aparadhakara janatava rju margayehi ætulu karanne næta
